mapper.select: SELECT SBCODE,BUNUM,SBPIC,SBTITLE,SBPRICE,SBLOC,SBDATE,BUID FROM SALE_BOARD ORDER BY SBCODE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALE_BOARD(SBCODE,BUNUM,SBPIC,SBTITLE,SBPRICE,SBLOC,BUID) VALUES(SBCODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL+1,(SELECT BUNUM FROM BUSINESS WHERE BUID = #{param1}),#{param2},#{param3},#{param4},#{param5},#{param1} )
